farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.desc: Till the fields for steady honest coin.
workNarrative: You spend the day tending crops under a harsh sun.
Rows of vegetables grow under your watchful care.
The earth yields its bounty to your patient hands.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.desc: Buy low, sell high. Master the art of trade.
workNarrative: You negotiate deals across three different markets.
A canny trade nets you more than expected today.
Merchants know that patience is the greatest weapon.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.desc: Forge weapons and armor for the kingdom.
workNarrative: Hammer rings against steel as you shape a blade.
Sparks fly as you craft armor for a local knight.
The forge burns hot as you lose yourself in the work.

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.desc: Brew potions and discover new concoctions.
workNarrative: Strange smoke rises as your latest brew takes shape.
You discover a more potent formula for healing potions.
The laboratory hums with magical energy around you.

knight.name: Knight
knight.desc: Serve the kingdom as a sworn protector.
workNarrative: You patrol the kingdom's borders, sword at the ready.
A bandit gang flees at the sight of your armor.
The king himself nods in approval at your dedication.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.desc: Study and teach arcane arts at the academy.
workNarrative: You lecture young apprentices on the nature of mana.
A breakthrough in your research yields unexpected results.
The arcane library yields its secrets to your searching mind.

assassin.name: Assassin
workNarrative: The target never saw you coming. Clean and efficient.
You vanish into the night after completing the contract.
Another name crossed off the list. Another coin earned.

dragon_tamer.name: Dragon Tamer
dragon_tamer.desc: Tame the most fearsome beasts in the world.
workNarrative: A juvenile dragon submits to your command after an hour of patience.
You ride an ancient wyvern across the Dragon Mountains.
Even elder dragons respect the authority in your voice.
